Donate to support development Next goal will be publishing app to Play Store Thank you for your support!
\nI\'m really happy this app is helping so many people, and even though I\'m not asking any money for it, I\'m SUPER! gratified that you believe in this work enough to give a contribution. Thank you for your trust! Show floating app icon Show floating button when app is not open Parsing and updating skillbooks locations Skillbooks locations: Skillbooks To enable this feature you first need to give to this app overlay permissions in your device settings Please rate the app! Leave a feedback: Next I don\'t want to donate Hey, thank you for using this app! \nIf you find it useful why don\'t you consider donating a small sum to support development? With your donations I\'ll be able to publish this app to Play Store! Read more... View donations View feedbacks I\'m really proud of this app, and I\'m surely happy when I see it helps so many people.\nHowever time spent to program and improve it is time I take away from something else, and even though I\'m a big OPTC player and I myself use the app, I\'m also a student, so I need time to attain my degree and to earn money to live.\nWhile I can surely keep improving the app as I did so far, donations help me in being more relaxed and in gaining more time for the app development. \nDonations are also needed to pay for services like Play Store. I think Play Store is an important upgrade this app needs since some people may have trouble installing it and some people may have concerns regarding its safety, issues that would be solved with the app released on Play Store.\n\nThat said, thank you all for using this app, I\'m really happy it helps! Feedbacks are anonymous and no other kind of data is collected.\nA link to the page with your feedbacks is in the settings screen of this app Wi-Fi update Update only when WiFi is on Close Notice board Please read an important notice by opening the right drawbar and touching the notice button "Crewmate ability: " Show notification shortcut Show a shortcut to this app and OPTC app in the notification bar
